products.name: Brazilian coffee, ground, 500 grams
products.description: This delicious Brazilian coffee is sealed for freshness, giving you the ultimate coffee-drinking experience. 500 grams of this robust and flavorful blend will bring you the perfect cup every time. With a full-bodies taste and subtle notes of chocolate, this cofee is sure to become your favorite. Enjoy the unique Brazilian flavor in every sip!

products.name: Green tea, 200 grams
products.description: This green tea is one of our most refreshing and delicious options. It's natural lack of coffeine makes it perfect for every time of the day!
